plot: Mohsen is improving his business life to higher levels, but when his wife gets involved in the business, he finds it difficult to tolerate the underlying conflicts.
title: Zendegi-e Khosousi-e Agha Va Khanom-e Mim
plot_es: Mohsen is improving his business life to higher levels, but when his wife gets involved in the business, he finds it difficult to tolerate the underlying conflicts.
original_name: Zendegi-e Khosousi-e Agha Va Khanom-e Mim
